job.title: Data Engineer - Health Sensing Hardware
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtapple is looking for a highly motivated individual with experience in data engineering to join the health sensing hardware team ltbrgtltbrgtthe successful candidate will be responsible for working with a team of sensing hardware engineers and algorithm engineers to manage and analyze data from user studies to identify key behaviors and establish relevant dependencies ltbrgtltbrgtthe candidate will be creating tools to consume data from cloud based databases run data quality analysis and root cause outliers the candidate will also be responsible for building tools to streamline the data analyzing with existing dlml algorithms the candidate will also be responsible for communicating and reviewing these findings with the team responsibilities will span working with the team to ensure data availability and integrity performing datamining and data interrogation communicating findings and working with the team to establish next steps in the sensor development a successful candidate needs to be flexible receptive to ideas from others team oriented and excited to work with colleagues to push the technology expect this work to include collaborating with multifunctional teams responsible for crafting and producing better sensor technologiesltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtdata professional with expertise in data science data analytics or similarltbrgtltbrgtstrong coding skills with tools such as pythonltbrgtltbrgtexperience developing data analytics systems for earlystage projects to help team learn about unknown dependenciesltbrgtltbrgtexperience interfacing and networking cloud based database aws etcltbrgtltbrgtflexible and collaborative willing to work in fastpaced technology developmentltbrgtltbrgtexcellent written and verbal communications skills excellent documentation skillsltbrgtltbrgtknowledge of dlml strongly preferredltbrgtltbrgtknowledge of optics physics and electrical engineering is beneficialltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtthe responsibilities of this position includes the following for productsltbrgtltbrgtsolicitconsolidate requirements from sensor engineers for data toolsltbrgtltbrgtbuild data analysis tools and analyze dataltbrgtltbrgtdata quality analysis and outlier analysisltbrgtltbrgtimplement algorithm evaluation toolsltbrgtltbrgtproduce present meaningful data visualization to teamltbrgtltbrgtdiscover new perspectives for old dataltbrgtltbrgtfinding opportunities for algorithm improvementsltbrgtltbrgtbuild accessible data warehouse to consolidate analysis resultsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation
